smartContracts.description: Deploy audited and field-tested smart contracts with one click. Connect to the smart contract from your dapp and start using it immediately.
smartContracts.emptyArchiveInfo: There are currently no Smart Contracts in the Archive.
smartContracts.info: Add it to your Web3 project

infoSection.title: Execute read & write functions
infoSection.p: Your smart contract was deployed via Apillon. This means certain write functions are available only through the Apillon Backend, until you decide to take ownership of the contract.
infoSection.info: Take ownership of the Smart Contract. Once you take ownership of the Smart Contract, you will be able to execute all the functions directly from your dapp. This is not a mandatory step, but it makes sense to take the ownership of the contract before going to production.
infoSection.infoTransferred: You are owner of this contract, now you execute all the functions directly from your dapp.
